>     john.link@... wrote:
>     > Since other people's view was explicitly requested, here comes
>     > mine...

>    Just wanted to express my total agreement with Johannes and J.B.


Darn, perhaps I should've said I wanted other views. ;-)

Seriously though, perhaps the question I should've posed to folks on this
list is:

What test runners do most ordinary folks [and not just the junit experts
who've been using it for years] use most, do those runner primarily use
collectors, and do suites add value to those runners?

Like I said, I believe that for ant and eclipse, two user communities, I
think the overall answer is no ... but I'd love to see some "market
research".

regards

Adam
